synthesis_summary: Refreshed the SPEC-KIT-045-mini rehearsal bundle around the 2025-10-14 guardrail run: new plan/tasks telemetry artifacts, roster/schema/policy/size logs, and synced documentation (plan, tasks, unlock notes, checksums, SPEC.md) now cite the latest evidence while preserving policy override caveats.
